topic.title: EMS Physical Assessment Section - conformance rules

section.p: A collection of qualitative assessments of the patient's physical condition and other facts

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11400 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.20"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10337)/@code="29545-1" Physical findings Narrative (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10336)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Physical Assessment Section" (CONF:10339)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10338)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:10975)
Conforms to Physical Assessment Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.78:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:10977)
Conforms to Patient Pregnancy (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.79:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:10979)
Conforms to Last Oral Intake (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.80:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10981)
Conforms to Patient Age (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.81:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10983)
Conforms to Thrombolytic Contraindications (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.82:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10985)
Conforms to Barriers To Patient Care (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.83:2022-01-01)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:11401)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Patient Body Weight (CONF:11099)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:11402)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Length Based Patient Body Weight Class (CONF:11100)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10337)/@code="29545-1" Physical findings Narrative (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10336)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Physical Assessment Section" (CONF:10339)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10338)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:10975)
Conforms to Physical Assessment Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.78:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:10977)
Conforms to Patient Pregnancy (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.79:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:10979)
Conforms to Last Oral Intake (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.80:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10981)
Conforms to Patient Age (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.81:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10983)
Conforms to Thrombolytic Contraindications (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.82:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10985)
Conforms to Barriers To Patient Care (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.83:2022-01-01)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:11401)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Patient Body Weight (CONF:11099)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:11402)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Length Based Patient Body Weight Class (CONF:11100)

body.codeblock: <section> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.20" extension="2022-01-01"/> <code code="29545-1" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Physical findings Narrative"/> <title/> <text/> </section>
